title: Video: Mmoths – Over You
content:
Hugely hyped shows all over the world, a mightily successful EP and now an exclusive track on Annie Mac’s AMP 2012 Compilation, alongside the likes of Azealia Banks, Diplo and Netsky; it’s fair to say that Irish beatmaker Mmoths is kicking up quite a fuss.

The tune in question, Over You, is precisely what we’ve come to expect from the teenager, atmospheric and club-friendly, yet maintaining a vivid personality. The visuals come from Feel Good Lost, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
